docs.text: Agent Integrations ¶ Welcome to the wonderful world of developing Agent Integrations for Datadog. Here we document how we do things, the processes for various tasks, coding conventions & best practices, the internals of our testing infrastructure, and so much more. If you are intrigued, continue reading. If not, continue all the same!
